ApexTestResult.name: ApexTestResult
ApexTestResult.description: Represents the result of an Apex test method execution.

ApexClassId.description: The Apex class whose test methods were executed.

ApexLogId.description: Points to the ApexLog for this test method execution if debug logging is enabled; otherwise, null.

ApexTestRunResultId.description: The ID of the ApexTestRunResult that represents the entire test run.

AsyncApexJobId.description: Points to the AsyncApexJob that represents the entire test run. This field points to the same object as ApexTestQueueItem.ParentJobId.

IsTestSetup.description: Indicates if the results are for a test setup method. The default is false.

Message.description: The exception error message if a test failure occurs; otherwise, null.

Outcome.description: The result of the test method execution. Can be one of these values: Pass Fail CompileFail Skip

QueueItemId.description: Points to the ApexTestQueueItem which is the class that this test method is part of.

RunTime.description: The time it took the test method to run, in milliseconds.

StackTrace.description: The Apex stack trace if the test failed; otherwise, null.

TestTimestamp.description: The start time of the test method.
